entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near midnight then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Becoming cloudy before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 8:24 PM CST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 9.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 8:24 PM CST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the evening. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind becoming south 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 12. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 8:24 PM CST Saturday 04 February 2023
